app.name: Agent Satisfaction App
app.help:
How would you rate this customer?
Use ASAT (agent satisfaction) to rate your customers, analyze the data, and build business rules around it.
Click a star to choose your rating and get an agent average for this customer
But there's more: build out a view of your lowest rated customers or create business rules to provide VIP treatment to those who have been rated poorly. The options are endless!
